item.title: Swin UNETR Note
item.description: Swin UNETR is a model using Swin Transformer and a U-shaped network architecture to perform medical image segementation. Its official implementation is available here. In this memo I write down some key points. Input and Output ðŸ”—The input is a $(N, C_i, D, H, W)$ tensor, in which $N$ is the batch size. $C_i$ is the number of input features. $D, H, W$ are the size of
